titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable John Joseph Moakley, a Representative from the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 157.
DEBATE - By unanimous consent, the House proceeded with an additional 60 minute period of debate on the resolution.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/6/2001--Passed House without amendment. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of Representative John Joseph Moakley of Massachusetts.
